info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:45PM MDT until June 23 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL YUMA COUNTY... At 644 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles east of Cope, or 18 miles west of Bonny Reservoir, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kirk and Idalia. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 216 and 219. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
